turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello there, I would like for you to order some coffee drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there, how may I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a large size Caffe Latte from Peets in Los Angeles on Fraido Street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order just one large Caffe Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What else do you like to have in there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't want anything else. Maybe add some extra milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk do you want to have in your coffee drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Add some steamed milk in the middle and with milk foam at the very top.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want full foam milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No just only at the top and don't overfill the cup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will write that down for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How long do you think you can have it done?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I think within 25 minutes at the latest.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds great I think I can go pick it up within that time frame.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What else do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think for now I am good. I just want to order a cup of coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That sounds great.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will let you know if I have anything else

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink will be shortly available and you will be able to go pick it up. Your receipt will be sent to your phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome. Goodbye!
